text: @adamwren @GovHolcomb @IndyMayorJoe We need to put the brakes on #reopeningschools. Our #teachers and #students should not be sacrificial lambs because we're sticking to an illogical calendar.  #COVID19 is trending the wrong way if #schools are expected to start in a couple of weeks.
